duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and complete individual and complex tax returns, ensuring compliance with IRS and state requirements.
Communicate effectively in person and in writing, providing tax planning and audit support to clients.
Assist with sales and marketing activities, promoting tax services and reaching out to potential clients.
Continuously enhance knowledge and skills through required continuing education and certifications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (CPA or Enrolled Agent certification preferred)
